t: Amazon.com: Epicuren Discovery Eye Cream, 0.5 oz. : Beauty & Personal Care
s: Just awful. Maybe this isn't the "real" Epicuren product...? I absolutely do not have dry skin but this eye cream (along with all of the other Epicuren face products I bought on Amazon) gave me dry, itchy, irritated skin. I have never experienced anything like it.
